gameDetails.name: Mythwind: Expanded Horizons
gameDetails.description:
The Expanded Horizons expansion adds a unique character to be used interchangeably with the core box characters or to increase the player count to 5!

Components:

     25 Event Cards
     2 Custom Worker Dice (16mm)
     2 Custom Sprite Dice (16mm)
     25 Adventure Cards
     10 Goal Cards
     10 Weather Cards
     Base Tray


—description from the publisher
